tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** ****** ** *** ***** ** ***** ********My name is Junaid rahman and I would like to share my personal experience with Dr. Revat laxman.
This review is regarding my personal experience with this doctor.
** ***** *** * **** **** ********* ** *** ****** He is very experienced in his work.
He is very good in nature. ** *** * **** ********* *** ** **** **** ********* He treats his patients with patience.
I visited this doctor when my mother met with bus accident and her spine L2 got fractured. I met many doctors in case of my mother but all doctors gave me clear reply to have a spine surgery done . I was very confused where to get the surgery done. 
After some time my one friend suggested me that you should meet to Dr. Revat (Apollo spectra hospital)
So I met to this doctor. He said that he could perform the spine surgery.
I got the surgery date within one week and after the surgery was done my mother recovered within one month of time and she started walking again.
We were very happy with the kind of treatment she received from the doctor as well as all the staffs from the hospital. All the staff members were so kind and we did not feel like we were in a hospital. Hospital atmosphere feels like home .
After 2 months my mother started her day to day routine. 
*** ***** ****** ** *** **** ******* He never suggest anything extra and didnt wasted any of our money.
The  package we received from the hospital was very Price efficient and reasonable.
I would definitely recommend this hospital for spine surgery and specially Dr Revat who made this surgery look like a very normal surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Rewat Laxman operated my left knee a month back! It was an ACL surgery. Doctor is very friendly and understand issues and explain them. 
I must say the surgery expertise was super awesome, there were no pain after the surgery!
I started putting full weight with walker from day 2. 
What I like about the doctor is, he is extremely responsive and keeps consistent touch with his patients which reduces lot is post operative anxiety. Doctor is concern on how to make his patient better alway. 

Thanks for the treatment!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: At a time when decisions are debated with plenty of social affirmation, and medical options always having been heavily deliberated, I understand reviews have a lot of power but also that they can be extremely useful when done right. Which is the least I can do for Dr. Rewat. He was always warm, open and clear with his diagnosis and plan for the surgery. His explanation and methods always had the big picture of long term recovery in clear view, and his language just the right mixture of professional opinion and friendly advice. He's happy to give you as much time or thought as you need while being open with communication channels from the start. Great experience, highly recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had consulted Dr Rewat after i had a fall and had an ACL tear which had to be reconstructed through surgery. Dr Rewat ensured that i understood my physical situation and didn't rush me for surgery. He was approachable and explained at length my status and progress before and post the operation. He also advised me to undergo few physio sessions before surgery to prep me prior to the actual surgery giving me ample confidence of faster recovery. The reconstruction was smooth and the doc was present throughout and my recovery happened as per the plan under the guidance of Dr Rewat.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Best thing about Dr. Rewat is he doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines or suggest unwanted procedures. 
I fractured my elbow and had a surgery in Pune. Few weeks after surgery my doctor told me that I might require another surgery. My family advised me to take second opinion and a family friend suggested Dr. Rewat's name. I travelled to Banagalore and when I showed my reports to him, I was scared to undergo another surgery. He patiently listened all the issues and asked me to get CT scan done. After looking at scan reports, he told me to start getting physiotherapy. He said we might not need to do another surgery. I followed his instructions. Few months later, my elbow has healed. Unlike other doctors, Dr. Rewat didn't take decision in haste and he explained how recovery may take time sometime. His patience and way of dealing with my injury made me confident that I was in safe hands. Thank you, Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very soft spoken and very much into ethics he follows..... Has plenty of patience to sit with and explain complex disease process in simple layman language.. 
It happen to me taking my mother for knee replacement surgery with him... It was indeed very smooth and memorable experience as if we had been to one week trip.... 
I would never had believed that my mom could able to manage her own work independly without undergoing surgery.....
More than a doctor, he s like a friend and down to earth man.... 
I would strongly recommend him for any issues related to ortho.. Be it simple sprain to complex probelmes needing surgeries..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** *** ******* ****** * **** **** ***** We have visited multiple hospitals and doctors for my father knee problem.  Almost are asked us to replace both the knees. Later by god grace we got a chance to meet Doctor Rewat Laxman.  He examined and explained my father knee problem and suggested us to go for only one knee replacement instead of two.  Yes he is correct, after surgery,  its been 3 years my father is walking like his young age.  I am happy to see my father walking like that again.  After surgery, He contiously followed till my father started walking with out anyones help. His friendly Nature makes my father Pressure free before operation.  I would strongly suggest Dr Rewat Laxman sir for any kind of orthopedic issues..!  Definitely you will get very good and transparent treatment from him..! Really thanks for everything Rewat Laxman sir.  This means a lot üôèüôè

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a fracture on my left leg ligament due to fall in the slippery floor. Initially, i have consulted one orthopaedic hospital but I was not happy with the doctors explanation. After few days my colleague referred dr. Laxman revanth in Apollo spectra. After consulting him, he explained me technically in detail . He was very patient in answering all my doubts. He was very friendly and suggested what is right and what is wrong.  More over, his approach towards a patient like me was very commendable.  I underwent surgery upon his advice and within 2 days i was discharged. To my surprise, i was able to walk and do all my personal work without support within 2 months. I am thankful to him and I suggest him for any Orthodox related issues to anybody.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I found Dr, Rewat Laxman a very sound professional while it comes to  technicality of the whole issue. My mother in law (MiL) went under surgery under Dr. Rewat. We have traveled all the way from Bangladesh and got both the knees fixed. My MiL is now  full okay and leading a very comfortable life after surgery. Dr. Rewat is a very good human and took all possible care during and post surgery situation even after we returned back to Bangladesh. I would highly recommend Dr. Rewat for any bone related complexities. We have experienced premium service at Apollo Spectra and it has been a very humbling and pleasant stay there.

tags: None
review:
Visited Dr Rewat for a sports injury that turned out of be fully torn ACL. The consultation was very good, Dr Rewat spent a lot of time explaining my options and suggested to go for surgery. He helped me clear all my doubts and concerns before the surgery and explained everything in detail.
The surgery went very well and I had a speedy recovery. In just 6 months of time, I was back to almost 100% of my physical mobility. It's been an year now and now I'm back to my original self, full fitness level. I'm really happy I went for surgery in due time and my decision to go with Dr Rewat.
reply_text: thankyou shubham for your kind words

review: My Father Mr. Majunath was suffering from serve Knee pain & serve back pain...as per Dr.Rewat laxman(Bone and joint consult) Guidance & Observation....My father was been operated...as the requirements..as my father is diabetic, bp & cholesterol patience...he has be taken care properly. my father supported best to Dr.Rewat laxman and Us( family members)by proper routine diet, exercise & stamina to fight with pain.Now my father is walking n sitting & trying to be next to perfection. so once again thanks to Dr.Rewat laxman on behalf of Mr.Majunath.

tags: None
review:
Visited Doc Rewat for my wife's knee pain. After x-ray and other reports doc gave some medicines and suggested to visit after a week. After 2 weeks of medication the pain was resolved. 
Doc is very polite and patient and explains issues and procedures nicely.

review: Doctor is experienced to handle issues professionally. Although we had consulted for illness related to arthritis, doctor could make out the underlying issue was different. His guidance is helping take right decisions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr. Rewat laxman has been great. His professionalism, ********* *** precise approach made me put my complete trust in him to reconstruct my ACL. He clearly explained about the injury, the required treatment and made sure I was comfortable right from the beginning. The surgery went very smoothly and I'm completely satisfied. Would highly recommend.

tags: Wait time,
review: Doctor wasn't available. The hospital didn't bother informing me beforehand. They didn't bother informing me while I was waiting there! I was sitting there in pain. After 30 mins, they said doctor isn't available at all today. If they had told me earlier, I would have gone somewhere else, and not aggravated my injury!
reply_text:
Dear sir you were 45 minutes late for your consultation 
And I had an emergency surgery 
Still I waited for half an hour 
I respect your review but it should be directed to the staff not me for I had informed them 15 mins before you eventually arrived.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I was diagnosed  with an ACL reconstruction after an injury 2 months back.
I was very impressed by the time taken by doctor to explain me the after effects of surgery and how I will be after the procedure ,how much time it will take and what the the complications 
I am undergoing surgery under him
I recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My mother had her knee replacement surgery done by Dr. Rewat Laxman. During this pandemic time we were concerned about the surgery. Dr. Rewat took personal care and gave us confidence to go ahead with the surgery by taking all the necessary precautions.  Now it‚Äôs been couple of weeks, my mother is doing good. Thanks to Dr. Rewat and his team for all their care and support.

tags: Wait time,
review: not the doctor but the hospital admin in particular was at fault. they called me an hour early and made me wait for 1 hour 20 mins. all the while saying doctor is coming shortly. at the end I asked them to call after which they said might take 2 more hours. could not meet the doctor. the doctor was busy but administration should be aware and not lie.
reply_text:
Dear Kashyap
I will deal with this very strictly.I always value my patients time so i agree with you ,wasting your precious time is not done.
I apologise for this bad experience 
Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rewat Laxman is very knowledgeable doctor in his field. He listens and understands the injury. I did an acl reconstruction and it feels very much normal as it was like before. He is friendly and this is what other surgeons  lack.
He explained properly with details about the surgery. That transparency is there with Dr. Rewat.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I, at 79 age, underwent total knee replacement surgery in Jan' 20 by Dr. Rewat Laxman at Apollo spectra hospital,5th block, Koramangala. I can now walk freely without any support. *** ****** ** ** ********* *********** ******* *** one can undergo surgery at his magic hands freely and without any tension. Needless to say, this hospital is blessed to have such an excellent surgeon.
Bhimrao H Illal

tags: Doctor friendliness,

After discussing with Dr rewat i got surgery done by him.he was their with me throughout the recovery and rehabilitation. I am able to walk climb steps freely and sit on the floor.
I am now planning to get other knee also operated.
Thank you doctor

review: My call with doctor lasted less than 5 minutes. He was uninterested to understand the problem. He did not ask any questions regarding the issue. All he said was to visit him, which doesn‚Äôt serve the purpose of paying for a telecommunication service such as Practo.
reply_text:
Dear Madam 
There are certain challenges and limits to video consultation 
Unlike other fields orthopaedic conditions sometimes warrants physical examination.Same was suggested to you in a polite way.
Asking questions is important but so is thorough clinical examination.
Best wishes

review: I visited doctor by checking his review online.. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Rewat is a brilliant surgeon, I've consulted him with my shoulder issues relating with recurrent dislocation. The way he explained the whole scenario was in simple and understandable manner. 

Post examining my shoulder, he suggested to go for surgery and I did hesitate in the beginning but he did motivate and guide me throughout the journey. 

I've blindly followed his instructions and 1 year post surgery I feel much better and I've recovered.

Highly recommended Dr.Rewat Laxman.
